mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userID, name, password, nickname, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate FROM rs_member WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT user_id AS userID, name, email, nickname FROM rs_member WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rs_member (user_id, name, password, email, nickname, reg_date) VALUES (#{userID}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, SYSDATE)
